pgrid.util
Class WorkerThread

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.util.WorkerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MaintenanceManager, Router, SearchManager
public abstract class WorkerThread
extends Object
implements Runnable

Abstract class providing basic framework for long-running tasks.

Version:
1.0 2003/03/14
Author:
Roman Schmidt

Constructor Summary
WorkerThread()
          Creates a new worker thread.

          Handles an occured exception.

Checks if the task can proceed.

Does a task's job; can wait on the internal lock Object or any other Objects during execution
